remarks: Weak property deduction for the group subtraction operation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Mar-2015.)
statement:
grpsubpropd.b $e |- ( ph -> ( Base ` G ) = ( Base ` H ) ) $.
grpsubpropd.p $e |- ( ph -> ( +g ` G ) = ( +g ` H ) ) $.
grpsubpropd $p |- ( ph -> ( -g ` G ) = ( -g ` H ) ) $.
